Eslanda Goode Robeson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eslanda_Goode_Robeson 0 Eslanda "Essie" Cardozo Goode Robeson (December 15, 1895 – December 13, 1965) was an American anthropologist, author, actor and civil rights activist. She was the wife and business manager of singer and actor Paul Robeson. Eslanda_"_Essie_"_Cardozo_Goode_Robeson ( December_15_,_1895 – December_13_,_1965 ) was an_American_anthropologist , author , actor and civil_rights_activist . She was the_wife_and_business_manager of singer_and_actor_Paul_Robeson .
